tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional dental care I received at Floss & Gloss Dental Care, Banaswadi recently. 

Dr. Roshan Varghese and the entire dental team displayed the utmost professionalism and expertise throughout my treatment. They took the time to thoroughly explain the procedures, ensuring I was comfortable and informed every step of the way.

Not only was the treatment efficient and precise, but the attention to detail and the genuine concern for my well-being truly stood out. The environment was clean, modern, and equipped with the latest technology, which further added to my confidence in the care I received.

Moreover, the follow-up care and guidance provided post-treatment were incredibly helpful and demonstrated your commitment to ensuring patients' continued dental health.

I am delighted with the results of my dental treatment and cannot thank you enough for the outstanding service. Your dedication to excellence in dental care sets a remarkable standard that I will wholeheartedly recommend to friends and family.

Dr. Varghese is a very patient and kind dentist. I went to him for tooth sensitivity. He has explained the problem and solution in detail at every step. And has attended to all my doubts on phone. Although the fracture was detected at the end, he was good enough to check my condition through the week several times before the surgery. Even arranged for a mouthwash that was not easily available. He has a team of specialists who all seem as calm and practised as him. My complete procedure will take around three months but so far I am very satisfied with the consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been Dr.Roshan he is very kind, friendly, professional, before visiting his clinic I had been to many clinic but was satisfied during my first visit, I was nervous about the pain during tooth extraction, but Dr.Roshan explained about the whole process of treatment, even the surgeon was very good I went for 1 tooth extraction but got 2 wisdom extracted,the doctor took at most care during whole treatment and followed up after the treatment too, follow the instructions to avoid complications.
Fees/charges are very nominal, COVID protocols are followed, 
I would highly recommend the doctor *** ** *** **** ********
reply_text:
Thank you so much Ann  mam for taking the time to leave this excellent review about your experience at our clinic. The credit goes to the surgeon as well who did the surgery. We really appreciate you in helping to share the word about us and such appreciation keeps our team motivated.
Warm Regards
Dr Roshan varghese
Dr Akash.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for total dental checkup and to enquire the cost for RCT and Crown. Treatment cost is budget friendly and good explanation about the treatment. He displayed me 3 to 4 Crowns with different materials and different price. He explained the total treatment procedure and usage of various crowns. He also asked me to take Voxel oral scan. In that x-ray he found out two wisdom teeth under the skin of lower jaw. I  just went for consulting for my dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: i visited doctor for root canal treatment . intially i believed it cannot be done since the tooth was broken. doctor explained the entire procedure very well and within 2 weeks i could complete my entire treatment with ease. i would recommended Dr Roshan to all,since he is very proffessional and polite
reply_text:
Thank you sreeshankar for taking the time to leave this honest review. We really appreciate you in helping to share the word about us and such appreciation keeps our team motivated.
Warm Regards
Dr Roshan varghese
Dr Ashley Varghese

review: Dr.Varghese is well experienced and detailed about the treatment and explanation of the condition of my tooth. He explained well in advance about the position of the teeth and briefed about the procedure and ensure am comfortable throughout the procedure. The post extraction care and follow up is all that made difference all together compared to my previous experience with dental issues. I would surely suggest and recommend for all the dental issues.
